title: r/Choosingbeggars Seeking Babysitter + Love-slave. Pay: $5/hour
description: r/Choosingbeggars In today's episode, OP is a young babysitter looking for work. She interviews with a Karen who seems to imply that she wants OP to join her in the bedroom. Karen intentionally lied to OP about how much money she was going to make. It turns out that the babysitting job includes cleaning, childcare, and "satisfying" Karen in the bedroom for a measly $5 per hour.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
